# subscript(_:_:)

**Instance Subscript**

Accesses the element at the specified position.

## Declaration

```swift
subscript(column: Int, row: Int) -> Double { get set }
```

## Element Access

- **subscript(_:)**: Accesses the column at the specified position.

items.description: Accesses the column at the specified position.
